title: Feed Registry
description: Object modelling a feed registry for a livestock farm.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be FeedRegistry

amount.description: Property. Amount of feed supplied to animals.

date.description: Property. Date of supply of food to animals

deliveryNote.description: Property. Description of the feed registry

farm.description: Relationship. Farm where the operation is carried out. https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Agrifood/blob/master/AgriFarm/schema.json
